ideas.title: Pill Calendar App
ideas.abstract: A calendar app to show if you took your daily/weekly/monthly pill. It has a FE which allows you to configure your pills after which it prompts you on the day: did you take your pill? And if you say no, it keeps bugging you until you do.
ideas.author: ricky

ideas.title: Multiflag Emoji App
ideas.abstract: This app has a number of country flags with continent selector!

ideas.title: Smart Fondue Pot Temperature Monitor
ideas.abstract: A smart fondue pot that monitors temperature.

ideas.title: Cuckoo Clock That Tweets Jokes
ideas.abstract: A cuckoo clock that tweets jokes.

ideas.title: Shoe Mileage Tracker
ideas.abstract: A simple web application to track the mileage of running shoes. Goal: To help runners know when their shoes have reached the recommended mileage limit (500 miles) and should be replaced.

ideas.title: Rick and Morty Collector's Nexus
ideas.abstract: A placeholder application for a Rick and Morty collector's nexus.

ideas.title: Rick and Morty Collectors Nexus (Next.js)
ideas.abstract: A Next.js application for a Rick and Morty collectors nexus.

ideas.title: Pokemon Game of 15
ideas.abstract: A placeholder for a Pokemon-themed game of 15 puzzle.

ideas.title: GitHub Public Repo Tracker
ideas.abstract: This application provides a centralized and efficient way for users to monitor open issues and pull requests (PRs) across multiple public GitHub repositories.
